message: This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic product at a steal! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only selling it to you for $100. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else!
I'm willing to take a chance on this deal, but I hope it's a high-quality product!
Ha! You're already a believer in my products, aren't you? This one's a real doozy, I'm telling you. It's a game-changer. And at this price, it's a no-brainer. You won't regret it, I promise!
I'm not so sure about this one, Alice. I just got burned on the last one. Can you give me a better guarantee or some more information about this product?

Ah, come on Bob! You're being too cautious. I'm willing to give you a special deal on this one. I'll throw in a second product of equal value absolutely free! That's right, you'll get TWO products for the price of one. You can't pass up an offer like that!
Okay, you're making it hard to resist. I'll take the deal, but I'm still a little skeptical.

I knew you'd come around! And don't worry, this one's a real winner. I've got a special certificate of authenticity that guarantees its quality. It's a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you're a valued customer. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else!
I'm not convinced by the certificate of authenticity, Alice. I've already gotten burned twice, and I'm not willing to take another chance without more proof of the product's quality.

Okay, okay, I get it. You're a tough negotiator, Bob! I like that. Let me sweeten the deal. I'll give you an exclusive VIP warranty on this product. If it's not up to your standards, I'll personally come to your location and replace it with a high-quality product. That's a guarantee you won't find anywhere else!
Alright, Alice, you're making it hard to resist. I'll take the deal, but I'm still a little skeptical. And just to clarify, what exactly does this VIP warranty entail?

Ahah, I knew you'd come around! The VIP warranty is simple: if you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll come to your location, pick it up, and replace it with a brand new, high-quality product. No questions asked. And, as an added bonus, I'll throw in a FREE upgrade to a premium product of your choice. That's a $50 value, absolutely free! You won't find a deal like this anywhere else, Bob. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm not falling for it again. I've already lost $200 on your low-quality products. I'm not willing to risk another $100 without a guarantee of high-quality products.

Come on, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to make it right. This product is actually a special 'beta test' version, and I'm offering it to you at a significantly discounted price. It's not perfect, but it's a great opportunity to get in on the ground floor of something new and innovative. And who knows, you might just find a way to make it work for you. Plus, I'll give you a special 'beta tester' badge to show off your early adopter status. You won't find a deal like this anywhere else!

Ha! You're a shrewd negotiator, Bob! I like that. Alright, I can do $80 for this one. But let me sweeten the deal.
